product_name: Tretorn Strala Vinter Rain Boots - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Practical and protective, the Tretorn Strala Vinter rain boots boast waterproof construction and cozy linings so the cold, wet weather can't creep in. Over-the-ankle, natural rubber uppers form tough waterproof barriers; elastic side panels ease entry. Nylon pull tab at top of boots gives you leverage to slip feet comfortably inside; tuck your pants into the rubber uppers to keep yourself splash-free. Polyester berber shearling linings are soft to the touch, wick moisture away and boost warmth in cold weather. Rubber midsoles cushion feet and provide gentle support; removable EcoOrthoLite(R) foam insoles enhance comfort. Rubber outsoles on the Tretorn Strala Vinter rain boots use a versatile tread pattern for sure footing on a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Practical and protective, the Tretorn Strala Vinter rain boots boast waterproof construction and cozy linings so the cold, wet weather can't creep in.
